title: Madonna singles discography
summary: American singer Madonna has released 88 singles and 24 promotional singles and charted with 16 other songs. She has sold more than 100 million singles worldwide.[1] According to Billboard, Madonna is the most successful solo artist in the Hot 100 chart history, second overall behind the Beatles.[2] In the United Kingdom, Madonna scored a total of 63 top-ten hits (more than any other female artist) and 12 number-two peaks (more than any other act).[3][4] In 2012, she was ranked as the best-selling singles female artist in the UK (fourth general) with 17.6 million singles sold.[5] At the 40th anniversary of the GfK Media Control Charts, Madonna was ranked as the most successful singles artist in German chart history.[6]
